## ServiceLocator.getAll() method

Gets an array of all dependencies by key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAll<K extends Key>(key: K, searchAncestors?: boolean): readonly Resolved<K>[];
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>

The key to lookup.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

searchAncestors


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>
